triggered_conditions: The owner can disable a strategy using setStrategyStatus, preventing users from claiming their vested tokens.
The owner can lock a strategy using lockStrategy, which prevents further modifications and potentially traps user funds.
The owner can withdraw tokens from the contract using withdrawTokens, which could drain the contract of funds.
attack_path_summary: The function call sequence allows the owner to disable a strategy, lock it, and then withdraw tokens, effectively preventing users from accessing their vested tokens and draining the contract of funds.
